forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies early, then partly cloudy this afternoon. High 17C. Winds E at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies early, followed by partial clearing. High 62F. Winds E at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies early, followed by partial clearing. Low 9C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies this evening will become partly cloudy after midnight. Low 47F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy early with showers for the afternoon hours. High 14C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness. Occasional rain showers in the afternoon. High 57F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers late. Low around 10C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: A steady rain in the evening. Showers continuing late. Low 49F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy early with partial sunshine expected late. High 13C. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies early will become partly cloudy later in the day. High 56F. Winds WNW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy skies early, then partly cloudy after midnight. Low 7C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly to mostly cloudy. Low around 45F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy skies. High 14C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy skies. High 57F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional rain after midnight. Low near 10C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional rain after midnight. Low 51F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of rain. High 12C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain. High 54F. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers early becoming a steady light rain late. Low 6C. Winds W at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers in the evening becoming a steady light rain overnight. Low 43F. Winds W at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers in the morning, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High near 10C. Winds WNW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers in the morning, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High near 50F. Winds WNW at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few clouds from time to time. Low around 5C. Winds NW at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. Low around 40F. Winds NW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Intervals of clouds and sunshine. High 11C. Winds WSW at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. High 52F. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with a few showers. Low 7C. Winds SSW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 30%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with a few showers. Low 44F. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 30%.

forecastday.title: Sunday

forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. High 53F. Winds S at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. Low near 45F. Winds S at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 60%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.fcttext: Showers early becoming less numerous later in the day. High 53F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%.
